title: Wakabayashi-kun ga Nekasetekurenai
original_name: 若林くんが寝かせてくれない
sinopse: Susumu is a high school history teacher who is constantly sleep-deprived due to his next door neighbors in his apartment building having loud, continuous sex every night. The only time he can find time to sleep is during afternoon break at his school. But Ikuno Wakabayashi, a first-year nurse's aid who is drawn to him, always finds some way to get in the way of his much needed rest.
